formalText: Last night she had a long last night.
But it's not helping her at all like spending an hour on the phone with someone who is telling her in detail about their suicidal ideation.

She really can't because she doesn't have the time and she has this job, and she's behind on her deadlines. It feels miserable that she's behind on her deadline. Every time she sits down to write, she has panic attacks, and she's just on the floor crying.
